mapper.select: select m.mem_no , m.mem_id , m.mem_name , m.email , a.pay_date , a.pay_price , p.pro_title from project p join pro_reward r on (p.pro_no = r.pro_no) join tb_order t on (r.reward_no = t.reward_no) join pay a on (t.or_no = a.or_no) join member m on (t.mem_no = m.mem_no)

select a.mem_no , mem_id , mem_name , pro_title , cp_price , pay_price , pay_method from (select m.mem_no , m.mem_id , m.mem_name , p.pro_title from member m join tb_order on m.mem_no = tb_order.mem_no join pro_reward on pro_reward.reward_no = tb_order.reward_no join project p on p.pro_no = pro_reward.pro_no where m.mem_no = ${memNo}) a join (select m.mem_no, coupon.cp_price from member m join mem_coupon on mem_coupon.mem_no = m.mem_no join coupon on coupon.cp_no = mem_coupon.cp_no where m.mem_no = ${memNo}) b on a.mem_no = b.mem_no join (select m.mem_no , p.pay_price , p.pay_method from member m join tb_order on tb_order.mem_no = m.mem_no join pay p on p.or_no = tb_order.or_no where m.mem_no = ${memNo}) c on b.mem_no = c.mem_no
